build.command: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && mkdir -p storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache,testing} storage/logs bootstrap/cache && chmod -R a+rw storage bootstrap/cache

start.command: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
